channel.title: Netbeans/Eclipse - Adding a auto header?
channel.description: Hey how would i auto add a header to every file in my server using netbeans or eclipse. Because i need to add the "GNU General Public License" and its license to the top of each file, and i have way over 100 files packaged in it. >.> :o Anyone help me please?

item.title: Netbeans/Eclipse - Adding a auto header?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I don’t think it is possible in those IDE’s, if you’d like I could write you a little Java application which will do it for you.

Read full topic
